dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan G端nnemann
dcterms:description: Cora_ml is a small subset of the original Cora dataset, which is a classic citation network dataset. It is a directed network where edges represent citation relationships.
dcterms:title: cora_ml

dcterms:creator: Zhilin Yang
William Cohen
Ruslan Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: Citeseer is a citation network dataset where nodes represent documents and edges represent citation links. It is used for semi-supervised learning tasks.
dcterms:title: citeseer

dcterms:creator: Jie Chen
Tengfei Ma
Cao Xiao
dcterms:description: Citeseer_full is an extended version of the Citeseer dataset, where all nodes except those in the validation and test sets are used in the training set.
dcterms:title: citeseer_full

dcterms:creator: Oleksandr Shchur
Maximilian Mumme
Aleksandar Bojchevski

dcterms:description: Amazon_photo is a co-purchase network dataset from Amazon where nodes represent goods and edges represent frequently bought together items.
dcterms:title: amazon_photo

dcterms:creator: Oleksandr Shchur
Maximilian Mumme
Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan G端nnemann
dcterms:description: Amazon_cs is another co-purchase network dataset from Amazon, similar to amazon_photo, where nodes represent goods and edges represent frequently bought together items.
dcterms:title: amazon_cs

dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan G端nnemann
dcterms:description: Coral_full is a full extension of the original Cora dataset, consisting of a larger number of nodes and edges, used for node classification tasks.
dcterms:title: coral_full
